name: Ultimate Marco Polo League
description:
Have you ever played Tag ?

Well this is Blind tag. And Everyone is It !

When everyone is mostly invisible, this can become pure chaos... but if you master the mechanics, this will become very interesting !

Challenge your friends during fun and short sessions.

Protip :  Gamepad is recommended, but you can play as 2 Players on one keyboard !

Online multiplayer is not available, but you can use a software like Parsec to play online !
